sentences.en: Farmers feed kitchen leftovers to the pigs.
sentences.cn: 农民用厨房里的残羹剩饭喂猪.

sentences.en: He can do miracles with a few kitchen leftovers.
sentences.cn: 他能用厨房里几样剩饭做出一顿美餐.

sentences.en: Phoebe: You should wrap the leftovers in cling film.
sentences.cn: 菲比: 你应该把剩菜用保鲜膜包起来.
她将所有吃剩的食物装入袋内.

sentences.en: She brewed a pot of soup from the leftovers.
sentences.cn: 她用吃剩下的菜冲一盆汤.

sentences.en: She cleared away the dishes and leftovers [ the tea - things ].
sentences.cn: 他把盘子和剩菜 [ 茶具 ] 收走了.

sentences.en: She cleared the leftovers from the table.
sentences.cn: 她清掉桌上的剩饭剩菜.

sentences.en: She made supper from leftovers she had thrown together.
sentences.cn: 她用吃剩的食物拼凑成一顿晚饭.

sentences.en: She warmed up the leftovers of last night's dinner.
So it could be just from a grave robber getting rid of his leftovers.
sentences.cn: 所以这可能是盗墓者遗弃下来的?

sentences.en: Take leftovers for lunch and bring your own snacks to work.
sentences.cn: 把剩饭打包当作午餐,并将自家的零食带到班上吃.

sentences.en: The only food I ever got was the family's leftovers.
sentences.cn: 我所得到的唯一食物就是这家人的残羹剩饭。

sentences.en: They pieced out a meal from leftovers.
sentences.cn: 他们用剩饭剩菜凑合成一顿饭.

sentences.en: When I was your age my father died and I was sold to Tongs as maid. There I ate the cold leftovers every day and I was often scolded and beaten.
sentences.cn: 像你这么大的年纪,我的爸爸死了,卖给童家里,吃残茶剩饭,还经常受骂挨打.

words.tran_cn: 遗留；剩余物；吃剩的食物（leftover的复数形式）

trans.tran_cn: （用复数）剩余物，残羹剩菜，（事物、习惯等的）遗留，遗物，剩余的，未用完的( leftover的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: You can refer to food that has not been eaten after a meal as leftovers
